name: Mainlining
description: After MI7 has been hacked, your primary goal is to bring a cyber-criminal network to justice. Played entirely from within the environment of your computer's desktop, Mainlining is a thrilling point and click hacking adventure that features a gripping narrative which will have you hooked from the very first case.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel i3 2.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
